org.openmuc.jdlms.client.impl
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  org.openmuc.jdlms.client.impl.Connection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpperLayer, org.openmuc.jdlms.client.IClientConnection, IAssociation
Direct Known Subclasses:
LNConnection, SNConnection
public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.openmuc.jdlms.client.IClientConnection, IUpperLayer, IAssociation

Base class used by all application level DLMS/Cosem connections

dataReceived

public void dataReceived(byte[] data)
Description copied from interface: IUpperLayer
Callback method, indicating that data has been received from the remote end point. If the lower layer adds frame header or footer around the sent data, these headers have to be already stripped at this point

Specified by:
dataReceived in interface IUpperLayer
Parameters:
data - The received data as raw byte array.

remoteDisconnect

public void remoteDisconnect()
Description copied from interface: IUpperLayer
Callback method, indicating that the remote end point closed the connection. This method is provided to allow the upper layers to gracefully close the connection and clean up.

Specified by:
remoteDisconnect in interface IUpperLayer
